divs: sighting detailsi've been very reluctant about posting this, but after watching "i know what i saw" tonight, i decided it's time. i like to sit outside when the sun is setting and watch for things in the sky (hubble, iss, satellites, ect....), this one night, i was sitting in my chair looking due west when from the north appeared 2 extremely large ufos heading southwest. they appeared to be somewhere near the edge of the atmosphere and if i had to guess, each would be approx. 3-5 miles across. as they headed from the north to southwest, they were crisscrossing with each other and then just vanished! the whole event lasted about 4 seconds. they were silver in color with a black center and had what looked like multiple cracks on the underside. the sun was also reflecting off of them, giving them a gold\yellowish\orange appearance. a month or so later i was watching ufo hunters and realized that what i had seen was done in an animation for the show.you can view it on youtube "ufo hunters giant ufo's 1\5 :25". pause at the 25 sec mark. i've had 2 sightings prior to this and 1 since, all different, but this is the most vivid of them all!
